bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Sort = `{{get('sort',Get('o'))}}`;
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
path = 'init?platform=android';
url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;
if(String(Account).length > 0 && String(source.getLoginHeader()).length > 0) {
    if (!kind) {
        Login();
        url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
        kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;
    }  
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);                                 
    exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
    var signdate = sign();
    cache.put("pica-sign", signdate);
    exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
    path = `users/favourite?s=${Sort}&page={{page}}`;
    header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  主　　题  ✣  　　　　　✣';
   exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('最近更新', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics/random`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path},{"headers":${header},"method": "GET"}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('随机本子', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI('大家都在看')}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('大家在看', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI('大濕推薦')}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('大师推荐', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI('那年今天')}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('那年今天', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI('官方都在看')}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('官方在看', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
   exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
   path = `comics/leaderboard?tt=H24&ct=VC`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path},{"headers":${header},"method": "GET"}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('24小时', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics/leaderboard?tt=D7&ct=VC`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path},{"headers":${header},"method": "GET"}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('7天', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics/leaderboard?tt=D30&ct=VC`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path},{"headers":${header},"method": "GET"}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('30天', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
   exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
   var kind = kind.categories;
   for (i in kind) {
       path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI(kind[i].title)}&s=${Sort}`;
       header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
       title = kind[i].title
       title = Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? java.t2s(title) : title;
       url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
       exploreUrl.push(explore(title, url, 1, 0.25, false));
   }
   BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
   for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
      exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
   }
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "okhttp/3.8.1",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
eval(String(source.loginUrl)); var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var Option = { "method": "GET", "headers": Headers }; if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : ''; if (!JSON.parse(result).data) { path = baseUrl.replace(/.*(comics.*)\,\{.*/, '$1'); url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}'; result = java.ajax(url); } var list = JSON.parse(result).data.comic; var $2 = element => String(java.getElements(element).text()); var $3 = element => java.getElements(element); path = 'comics/' + list._id + '/eps?page=1'; url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}'; author = String(list.author + ((list.chineseTeam && list.chineseTeam !== '') ? ('/' + list.chineseTeam) : '')).replace(/,|、|，/g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/'); var kind1s = []; var kind1Elements = list.categories; for (var j in kind1Elements) { kind1s.push(String(kind1Elements[j]).replace(/\sENG/, '')); } kind1 = kind1s.join(','); var kind2s = []; var kind2Elements = list.tags; for (var j in kind2Elements) { if (!kind1.includes(kind2Elements[j])) { kind2s.push(String(kind2Elements[j])); } } kind2 = kind2s.join(','); s = '✦ ' + Num(list.viewsCount) + ',' + '♥ ' + Num(list.likesCount); k = (list.finished ? '完结,' : '连载') + ',' + kind1 + ',' + kind2; t = list.updated_at.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/\..*/g, ''); t1 = list.created_at.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/\..*/g, ''); l = ''; l = String(l); l = Get('settle') == true ? l.replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, l.match(/\d+/) ? l.match(/(\d+)/)[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : l; Setting = '\n📌当前源站：' + (Get('ci0') == 0 ? '〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + x[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 26 ? Get('url').substring(0, 26) + "
" + Get('url').substring(26) : Get('url')) + ('\n📚当前排序：〖' + (Get('o') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + O[Get('o')]) + ('\n📰评论页数：〖' + (Get('f') == 5 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗前' + Get('f') + '页') + ('\n🔍繁体搜索：' + (Get('search_TC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')) + ('\n📑繁简转换：' + (Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? '〖默认〗开启' : '〖自选〗关闭')) + ('\n🗃目录整理：' + (Get('settle') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; var list1 = []; for (var c = 1; c <= Get('f'); c++) { var page = c; path = baseUrl.replace(/.*(comics.*)\,\{.*/, '$1') + '/comments?page=' + page; Url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}'; result1 = java.ajax(Url); var pageList = JSON.parse(result1).data.comments.docs; list1 = list1.concat(pageList); } var intro2 = ''; var intro3 = ''; for (i in list1) { var intro2_1 = '[' + list1[i].created_at.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/\..*/g, '') + ']'; var intro2_2 = '⛄ Lv' + (list1[i]._user ? (list1[i]._user.level + (list1[i]._user.gender == 'm' ? ' ♂' : (list1[i]._user.gender == 'f' ? ' ♀' : ' 🤖')) + '【' + list1[i]._user.name + '】: ') : ''); var intro2_3 = list1[i].content; if (list1[i]._comic.commentsCount > 0) { path = 'comments/' + list1[i]._id + '/childrens?page=1'; Url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}'; result2 = java.ajax(Url); var list2 = JSON.parse(result2).data.comments.docs; for (j in list2) { var intro2_1_1 = '[' + list2[j].created_at.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/\..*/g, '') + ']'; var intro2_2_1 = '⛄ Lv' + (list2[j]._user ? (list2[j]._user.level + (list2[j]._user.gender == 'm' ? ' ♂' : (list2[j]._user.gender == 'f' ? ' ♀' : ' 🤖')) + '【' + list2[j]._user.name + '】: ') : ''); var intro2_3_1 = list2[j].content; intro3 = intro3 +'\nㅤ ' + intro2_1_1 + '\nㅤ ' + intro2_2_1 + intro2_3_1; } } intro2 = intro2 + '\nㅤ\n' + intro2_1 + '\n' + intro2_2 + intro2_3 + intro3; intro3 = ''; } if(String(Account).length > 0) { let dataId = String(list._id); var SC = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(book.originName + Account + dataId)) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(book.originName + Account + dataId)) : ''; var BN = list.title; var Bookname = BN.length >= 60 ? BN.substring(0, 14) + "\n" + BN.substring(14, 29) + "\n" + BN.substring(29, 44) + "\n" + BN.substring(44, 59) + "\n" + BN.substring(59) : (BN.length >= 45 ? BN.substring(0, 14) + "\n" + BN.substring(14, 29) + "\n" + BN.substring(29, 44) + "\n" + BN.substring(59) : (BN.length >= 30 ? BN.substring(0, 14) + "\n" + BN.substring(14, 29) + "\n" + BN.substring(29) : (BN.length >= 15 ? BN.substring(0, 14) + "\n" + BN.substring(14) : BN))); if (book.readConfig && book.group > 0 && !SC.includes('y')) { path = 'comics/' + dataId + '/favourite'; url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'POST') + ',"body":{},"method": "POST"}'; res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data.action; if (res == 'un_favourite') { java.ajax(url); } cache.put(java.md5Encode16(book.originName + Account + dataId),'y'); login(Put(JSON.stringify('【收藏提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋\n' + Bookname + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️已添加收藏❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛'))); } if (book.readConfig && book.group < 1 && SC.includes('y')) { path = 'comics/' + dataId + '/favourite'; url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'POST') + ',"body":{},"method": "POST"}'; res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data.action; if (res == 'favourite') { java.ajax(url); } cache.put(java.md5Encode16(book.originName + Account + dataId),'n'); login(Put(JSON.stringify('【收藏提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋\n' + Bookname + '\n┋┋' + '\n♣️已取消收藏♣️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛'))); } } book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': list.title, 'author': author, 'kind': String(s + ',' + k).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1'), 'word': '', 'latest': l + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ('更新时间：' + t.replace(/\s.*/, '') + ' 上架时间：' + t1.replace(/\s.*/, '') + ' 上传用户：' + list._creator.name + '\nㅤ\n') : '') + (list.description ? list.description.replace(/(^)/g, '$1
') : '') + changeLog + '☕【评论】 评论数：' + (Get('f') > 0 ? JSON.parse(result1).data.comments.total : '') + intro2, 'cover': list.thumb.path.includes('tobeimg/') ? (imghost + list.thumb.path.replace(/tobeimg/,'')) : (!list.thumb.path.includes('tobs/') ? (imghost1 + '/static/' + list.thumb.path) : (list.thumb.fileServer + '/static/' + list.thumb.path)), 'url': url, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { (function Book() { apiBaseUrl = cache.get(java.md5Encode16('cache_api_' + Get('url'))); json = java.ajax(apiBaseUrl); Title = JSON.parse(json)['title']; Intro = cache.get(java.md5Encode16('User' + Get('url'))) == 'y' ? JSON.parse(json)['intro1'] : JSON.parse(json)['intro']; return { Title: Title, Intro: Intro }; }()); book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'], 'latest': Title[Title.length - 1], 'intro': Intro[0] }); } Put(book);

ruleContent.content:
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { eval(String(source.loginUrl)); if (!JSON.parse(result).data) { path = baseUrl.replace(/.*(comics.*)\,\{.*/, '$1'); url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}'; result = java.ajax(url); } imglist=JSON.parse(result).data.pages.docs; var result=''; for (i in imglist) { url = imglist[i].media.path.includes('tobeimg/') ? (imghost + imglist[i].media.path.replace(/tobeimg/,'')) : (!imglist[i].media.path.includes('tobs/') ? (imghost1 + '/static/' + imglist[i].media.path.replace(/tobeimg/,'')) : (imglist[i].media.fileServer + '/static/' + imglist[i].media.path)), result += '\n' } } else { if (baseUrl.includes('/json/')) { '
'; } else { '
'; } }
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
if (!JSON.parse(result).data) {
    path = baseUrl.replace(/.*(comics.*)\,\{.*/, '$1');
    url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
    result = java.ajax(url);
}
var pages = JSON.parse(result).data.pages.pages;
var urls = [];
if (pages > 1) {
    for (i = 2; i <= pages; i++) {
        path = baseUrl.replace(/.*(comics.*page=).*/, '$1') + i;
        url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
        urls.push(url);
    }
    urls;
}
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    eval(String(source.loginUrl));
    var Date = String(java.timeFormat(new Date().getTime())).replace(/\d+\/(.*)\s.*/, '$1');
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0 && !Date.includes(cache.get("pica-sign"))) {
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("pica-sign", signdate);
    }
    if (/page=/.test(baseUrl)) {
        path = baseUrl.replace(/.*(comics.*)/, '$1').replace(/.*(users.*)/, '$1');
        page = baseUrl.replace(/.*page=(\d+).*/, '$1');
        url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
        result = java.ajax(url);
        var list = JSON.parse(result).data.comics.docs;
        if (page > JSON.parse(result).data.comics.pages) {
            list = [];
        }
        for (i in list) {
            author = String(list[i].author).replace(/,|、|，/g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/');
            var kind1s = [];
            var kind1Elements = list[i].categories;
            for (var j in kind1Elements) {
                kind1s.push(String(kind1Elements[j]).replace(/\sENG/, ''));
            }
            kind1 = kind1s.join(',');
            var kind2s = [];
            var kind2Elements = list[i].tags;
            for (var j in kind2Elements) {
                if (!kind1.includes(kind2Elements[j])) {
                    kind2s.push(String(kind2Elements[j]));
                }
            }
            kind2 = kind2s.join(',');
            kind = (list[i].totalViews ? ('✦ ' + Num(list[i].totalViews) + ',') : '') + '♥ ' + Num(list[i].likesCount || list[i].totalLikes) + ',' + (list[i].finished ? '完结' : '连载') + ',' + kind1 + ',' + kind2;
            path = 'comics/' + list[i]._id;
            url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': author,
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].thumb.path.includes('tobeimg/') ? (imghost + list[i].thumb.path.replace(/tobeimg/,'')) : (!list[i].thumb.path.includes('tobs/') ? (imghost1 + '/static/' + list[i].thumb.path) : (list[i].thumb.fileServer + '/static/' + list[i].thumb.path)),
                'url': url
            });
        }
        if (page == JSON.parse(result).data.comics.pages) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).data.comics;
        for (i in list) {
            author = String(list[i].author).replace(/,|、|，/g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/');
            var kind1s = [];
            var kind1Elements = list[i].categories;
            for (var j in kind1Elements) {
                kind1s.push(String(kind1Elements[j]).replace(/\sENG/, ''));
            }
            kind1 = kind1s.join(',');
            kind = '✦ ' + Num(list[i].totalViews) + ',' + '♥ ' + Num(list[i].likesCount || list[i].totalLikes) + ',' + (list[i].finished ? '完结' : '连载') + ',' + kind1;
            path = 'comics/' + list[i]._id;
            url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': author,
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].thumb.path.includes('tobeimg/') ? (imghost + list[i].thumb.path.replace(/tobeimg/,'')) : (!list[i].thumb.path.includes('tobs/') ? (imghost1 + '/static/' + list[i].thumb.path) : (list[i].thumb.fileServer + '/static/' + list[i].thumb.path)),
                'url': url
            });
        }
        if (!baseUrl.includes('random')) {
            Data()
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    eval(String(source.loginUrl));
    var list = JSON.parse(result).data.comics.docs;
    for (i in list) {
        author = String(list[i].author + (list[i].chineseTeam !== '' ? ('/' + list[i].chineseTeam) : '')).replace(/,|、|，/g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/');
        var kind1s = [];
        var kind1Elements = list[i].categories;
        for (var j in kind1Elements) {
            kind1s.push(String(kind1Elements[j]).replace(/\sENG/, ''));

                kind2s.push(String(kind2Elements[j]));
            }
        }
        kind2 = kind2s.join(',');
        kind = (list[i].totalViews ? ('✦ ' + Num(list[i].totalViews) + ',') : '') + '♥ ' + Num(list[i].likesCount) + ',' + (list[i].finished ? '完结' : '连载') + ',' + kind1 + ',' + kind2;
        latest = '〔' + list[i].updated_at.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/\..*/g, '') + '〕';

        url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
        data.push({

            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',

    if (page == JSON.parse(result).data.comics.pages || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    if (!JSON.parse(result).data) {
        path = baseUrl.replace(/.*(comics.*)\,\{.*/, '$1');
        url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
        result = java.ajax(url);
    }
    eval(String(source.loginUrl));
    var pages = JSON.parse(result).data.eps.pages;
    var list = JSON.parse(result).data.eps.docs;
    date = list[0].updated_at.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/\..*/g, '')
    for (i in list) {
        path = 'comics/' + baseUrl.replace(/.*comics\/(.*)\/eps.*/, '$1') + '/order/' + list[i].order + '/pages?page=1';
        url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
        title = list[i].title;
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.unshift({
            'title': i == 0 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': url,
            'time': list[i].updated_at.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/\..*/g, '')
        });
    }
    if (pages > 1) {
        for (j = 2; j <= pages; j++) {
            path = baseUrl.replace(/.*(comics.*page=).*/, '$1') + j;
            url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
            result = java.ajax(url);
            var list = JSON.parse(result).data.eps.docs;
            for (i in list) {
                path = 'comics/' + baseUrl.replace(/.*comics\/(.*)\/eps.*/, '$1') + '/order/' + list[i].order + '/pages?page=1';
                url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
                title = list[i].title;
                order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
                title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
                data.unshift({
                    'title': title,
                    'link': url,
                    'time': list[i].updated_at.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/\..*/g, '')
                });
            }
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var path = 'comics/advanced-search?page=' + page;
    var body = `{"keyword":"${e}","sort":"${get('sort',Get('o'))}"}`;
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'POST') + ',"body":' + body + ',"method": "POST"}';
}(key));
</js>

ruleContent.content: id.content@textNodes##秀书网为你提供最快的.*免费阅读。https://www.xiumb9.com
